LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallOxygenTank.label: destroyed small oxygen tank
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallOxygenTank.descriptio: This tank once supplied oxygen to the gravship, but it’s now broken and useless. Some steel can still be salvaged from it.
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallAstrofuelTank.label: destroyed small astrofuel tank
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallAstrofuelTank.descrip: This tank once stored astrofuel for thrusters, but it has been destroyed. Its frame still holds recoverable materials.
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedGravExtender.label: destroyed grav field extender
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedGravExtender.description: This device once expanded a gravship’s build area, but it is now shattered. Some valuable parts can still be reclaimed.
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallThruster.label: destroyed small thruster
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallThruster.description: This thruster once powered the gravship, but it is now wrecked beyond use. Scraps of metal and components can still be taken.
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedLargeThruster.label: destroyed large thruster
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedLargeThruster.description: This powerful thruster once pushed gravships across space, but now it lies broken. Even ruined, it holds some useful salvage.
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallHeatsink.label: destroyed small heatsink
LanguageData.VQEA_DestroyedSmallHeatsink.description: This heatsink once cooled the gravship’s systems, but it has burned out. Some steel can still be recovered from the wreck.
